net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_DiceRoller_roll
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
This is the roller to roll dice from an array of provided RollExpressions. When ran with a token selected, _dnd5e_lastRolledExpression is set to the processed RoleExpression[]
arg(0) = RoleExpression[] arg(1) = (optional) the amount to multiply the totalRolls property, normally used by DiceRoller when rolling child expressions
